title: KUWTK Teaser: Kourtney Kardashian invites Sophia Richie on trip
text:
Sofia Richie was all about casual chic when she was seen out in a black ensemble in Hollywood on Thursday.

Scott Disick's girlfriend, who recently turned 21, looked to be in embroiled in a heated cell phone conversation.

This sighting comes a day after Disick's ex Kourtney Kardashian revealed to sister Khloe why she invited the blonde model on her family trip to Findland.

Beautiful blonde: Sofia Richie was seen out in an all black get up in Hollywood on Thursday

Richie was dressed in a sweater, skin-tight velvet pants and mid-calf boots. She added a chunky diamond necklace.

And the beautiful blonde wore sunglasses to protect her eyes from the bright light.

Kourtney revealed why she invited her ex-beau's girlfriend on a family vacation in a sneak peek at Sunday's Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

The snippet showed Kourtney, 40, driving along a freeway as she chatted to her sister Khloe, 35.

Kourtney said, quite casually: 'So I'm going to Finland for spring break and I just said to Scott, "Do you want to invite Sofia?"'

Phoning it in: The 21-year-old's outing comes after Kourtney Kardashian revealed why she had invited the girlfriend of her ex, Scott Disick, on a family spring break to Finland

'My God, really,' Khloe replied while checking out her phone. 'Yes, well we've traveled together already,' Kourtney explained.

The blonde complimented her sister saying: 'Well that's nice of you, you're such a good co-parenter.'

'Yes, I am,' Kourtney replied.

Stunning celebrity: Kourtney, at the amfAR New York Gala at Cipriani Wall Street in February, talked about inviting Sofia to Findland in a KUWTK teaser shared this week

She and Scott, 36, who were together nine years, share Mason, nine, Penelope, six, and Reign, four.

'They don't make me feel left out, which is nice, or else I wouldn’t go or invite her to come,' she continued.

Suddenly seeing things from Sofia's point of view. Khloe asked: 'Has anyone ever asked her how she feels?'

Car talk: Kourtney talked about her decision as she drove sister Khloe, saying, 'They don't make me feel left out, which is nice, or else I wouldn’t go or invite her to come'

A bemused Kourtney said: 'Well, I haven't. I feel like that's up to them to have their conversations. I'm not here to try to make anyone feel uncomfortable...'

Khloe cut in saying: 'I would hope she would say something to her own boyfriend,' as her sister agreed.

Keeping Up With The Kardashians airs on Sundays on E!
description: The 21-year-old girlfriend of Scott Disick, 40, was spotted out in Hollywood on Thursday. She is due to make her KUWTK debut on  Sunday and  was the subject of a sneak peek released on Friday.
